item.title: Back at It
item.description: Sometimes it takes more than Motivation Lessons learned: It’s so easy to fall out of practice A short break, to catch up on some reading, a delve into some other interests and lo-and-behold I felt almost back at stage one when I tried to do a Leetcode exercise
